name: Mechanic Together
description:
Mechanic Together is a 2D platform Local Co-Op Game. You play as a blue and red robot.  together you become strong enough to complete every level and beat the game.  Control the Blue robot with AWD and the Red robot with the arrowkeys. In this game u can find puzzles, parcour and a bit of thinking. There are 4 levels including a tutorial level.

Note: this game is only for 1920 x 1080. It can go with other screens but some stuff will look bad.
The gravity in level1 can be a bit funky.
